暴雪🤡

从2016年的夏天开始玩守望先锋，那时候和朋友们组队玩完一局继续下一局，可以从早玩到黑。随着后续更新，以前可以自由选择阵容，暴雪更改选择阵容规则告诉玩家你们要这样选这样玩，固定了玩家的选择，后续继续骚操作，暴雪的运营逐渐发展成"我要教玩家玩游戏，玩家连游戏都玩不明白”。慢慢的游戏的匹配时间从十几秒匹配成功到一分钟，玩家开始流失。最后甚至到了两三分钟，暴雪还做了一个突击模式来让玩家打发等待时间，但感觉暴雪对玩家流失的情况一点也不在乎，继续认为自己的行业地位很高，更新速度比蜗牛还慢。最终我弃游了，游戏好友列表里面也有很多弃游了。游戏本身就应该是玩家的探索，而不是在强行颁布规则让玩家必须在自己制定的规则下游玩。今年2月的时候国服关闭，所有中国玩家花时间收集的东西，花钱买的东西，全部被动视暴雪这个已被资本掌握的公司一纸公告而结束。对于中国玩家，动视暴雪从来都没有正视过，他们在乎的或许只有增长的收入和自己股价的高低。

This game is the epitome of modern blizzard and their greed. Overwatch 2: the whole point of the 2 was to bring in the PvE mission game mode that let you customize your abilities to face a horde of robots. What we got was Archives+ that just made archives more flashy. IF your new to Overwatch, which i doubt most people playing this game are, Archives was a Co-Op event that added lore based missions to Overwatch and brought some semblance of a story mode to the game. The 2 was supposed to give us that story mode. What did we get? Grindy battlepass, overpriced skins, and 3 MISSIONS that are also overpriced for what they are. They couldnt even bother to give us the character select stuff from Archives like Retribution where it would be a custom character select screen. This game is a lazy cash grab, aimed at milking your wallet dry by a company that cant even treat their employees right without harassing them. Save your time, dont get this piece of shit game. I have over 1000 hours in overwatch, i played on my xbox and pc for a long time when the game first came out as origins edition on consoles. I have seen this game thrive and then quickly die and turn into a shell of its former self.

Some perspective from a player that's been playing Overwatch since 2016 and over 3k hours total in the game. I was HEAVILY invested in competitive seasons 1-4 even playing on a few teams that played for real money. This game now is a far cry from what it once was in terms of what I invested a good portion of my life into back then. While the game play has remained fairly consistent and the balance of characters.....quirky.....at times, the game never felt totally unbalanced. 

While most recent reviews for this game focus on the failure to deliver the promised PvE content, to me that's just the tip of the iceberg.

My biggest issue with the game today isn't as much as the balance or gameplay loop, but the stupidly predatory monetary practices related to earning in game items. As a day one 2016 player, I have pretty much everything in the game for the characters I play already, but having new friends come into the game is depressing in terms of unlocking things. 

I remember back in the day when we all joked about loot boxes, and how it couldn't get worse, boy were we wrong. At least with the loot boxes, you got a chance to get the legendary items, and if not by chance, earning tokens from opening said boxes to buy them within a reasonable time. NOW you have to wait to spend $20 on skins during seasonal times and item shop rotations that were once FREE.

Only play this game if you wanna if you think the core game play is interesting, if you care in the slightest about cosmetics or character customization as a new player STAY AWAY.

I loved this game, and still do, and even come back from time to time to play it. But this game is like the drug addict son who's life is a shambling disaster, but every now and then does something "good". So you go to check it out only to find, that while a slight improvement, is still a total mess.

Overwatch 2 Italia
Attivi da oltre 2 anni su Discord, siamo come da titolo la community più grande ed attiva in Italia dedicata ad Overwatch.

🡆 Promuoviamo una community toxic free, moderata dove l'obiettivo è quello di creare un ambiente sano dove i player possano ritrovarsi per giocare in amronia, sia chill che tryhard.
🡆 Sistema assegnazione ruolo/piattaforma e rank con annessi ping e canali
testuali/vocali dedicati
🡆 Scrim con cadenza settimanale e tornei con cadenza bimestrale
🡆 Team interni seguiti da coach\responsabili
🡆 Servizio coaching GRATUITO da parte dei nostri fantastici coach di community

Accogliamo player di qualsiasi piattaforma, ruolo e rank.

Soft\casual players o tryhardoni, son tutti benvenuti!

Se siete alla ricerca di italiani con cui giocare e far gruppo in generale, o team fisso anche per ranked, è il posto giusto! Provare per credere!
